Job Description:
Total 2 to 3 years of application development experience using ASP. NET and VB. Net/ C#

Hands- on experience with Visual Studio 2013/ 2017 and . NET v4. 0/ v4. 5

Working knowledge of object oriented design principles and patterns

Good Knowledge on Angular 4/ 5,  . Net Core and Web APIs

Familiar with Session State Management,  Caching,  Http handlers and Modules,  Page life cycle,  Error handling etc

Good knowledge of RDBMS design concepts and coding practices

Working experience of SQL Server (TSQL,  SPs,  functions,  triggers,  joins etc)

Good knowledge of Unit testing (component testing,  boundary conditions,  interfaces,  positive and negative scenarios etc)

Good to have knowledge on Crystal Reports
